description: Take your memories wherever you go with the Coby DP151 Digital Photo Keychain. A compact and easy way to store your photo files, this photo keychain is convenient and portable. Its LCD full-color display can present all your memorable moments in slideshow mode at the touch of a button.Product FeaturesLCD full-color displayDisplays JPEG, GIF, and BMP image filesStores 60 photosPhoto slideshow modeIntegrated rechargeable lithium-ion batteryUSB port for fast file transfersProduct Specs   DisplayDisplay Type1.44" CSTN LCDDisplay Resolution128 x 128Media/Format SupportMedia SupportIntegrated NOR flashPhoto Format SupportJPG, GIF, BMPGeneralAdditional FunctionsSlideshow; ClockComputer InterfaceUSB 2.0 Hi-SpeedOSD Menu LanguagesEnglish, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Dutch, PolishCertificationsCE, FCCPowerBattery TypeRechargeable Li-Polymer Battery; Power In: USBWeights & MeasurementsUnit Dimension (WHD)2.1" x 1.1" x 0.5"Package Dimension (WHD6.37" x 8.57" x 1"
title: Coby DP151WHT 1.5-Inch Digital TFT LCD Photo Keychain, White
